member.value: true, to enable collection editing; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Lists values that specify which properties are shown.
Display all properties in the underlying data source.
Display only properties that are defined in XAML.
Lists values that specify how grid data is sorted.
Sorts grid data by property headers in ascending order.
Sorts grid data using a custom sorting rule, implemented within the event handler.
Sorts grid data in definition order. Properties having no definitions are located below properties that have definitions.
Sorts grid data by definition headers in descending order.
Doesn't sort grid data.
Uses the value of the property.
Lists values that specify how properties are filtered.
Filters only by header content.
Filters both by header content and value.
Filters only by value.
Lists values that specify the location of the property description.
Disable showing property descriptions.
Show property descriptions within the description panel.
Show property descriptions within the tooltip.
Show property descriptions within the description panel and the tooltip.
This class supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Initializes a new instance of the PropertyDefinitionCollection class with default settings.
Serves as a base for classes that represent property definitions.
